raw_body: EYABALAN – MUTTIAH – Beloved husband of Ratnavathy (Ratna,​ nee Nathaniel). Son of late Paramu William Muttiah and late Sugirtham (Kanapathipillai),​ son-in-law of late Robert Navaratnam Nathaniel and Florence Suhirtham (nee Walton),​ loving brother of Jeyaveeran and Vathani,​ late Jeyatheeran and Dawn Anuba,​ Jeyayogam and Kingsley George,​ brother-in-law of the late Vetharajan Nathaniel and Gnanes,​ the late Sathiyavathy and the late Perinpanayagam,​ Gnanasoundari and Stephen Selvadurai,​ loving father of Dushan and Jeyanthi,​ Pretheeva and Julian,​ affectionate grandfather to Benjamin,​ Sonya,​ Nathan,​ Rebekha and Miriam,​ Esther,​ Ruth,​ Samuel. Safe in the Arms of Jesus,​ died peacefully on the evening of September 16,​ 2023 surrounded by family. Funeral on Thursday,​ September 21st at 1.00 p.m. at Beechwood Cemetery,​ Ottawa. Following an hour of private family viewing,​ there will be a time of public visitation from 11 a.m. prior to the service.059581
